title: Champion freezeing issues
body: Every now and or back to back days when i enter a game after select my character will start freezeing I have restarted my router countless and have still seen no improvement my fps and ping is fine when it happens and it gets frustrating dieing. If its the first game of the day I'll just close league knowing I'll wont be able to play. How do u fix this issue

replies.body: Are you on Windows 10?  There's been an issue where an update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing freezing.  Disable it and let me know if that helps!
No im not using Windows 10 im still using 7 on my desktop lol

Hmm, a strange issue!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team will take a look.  Grab some logs as well through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach it to your ticket.  We'll get back to you!
